pre_survey.description: Helpline Specific configs/lex/en_NZ/intents Pre Survey Intent Survey intent

conclusion_statement.content: We'll connect you with someone soon. Your conversation will be recorded and may be monitored for quality purposes. For more information, here's a link to our privacy statement: https://youthline.co.nz/privacy-statements/

rejection_statement.content: We'll connect you with someone soon. Your conversation will be recorded and may be monitored for quality purposes. For more information, here's a link to our privacy statement: https://youthline.co.nz/privacy-statements/

value_elicitation_prompt.content: Kia ora, you've reached Youthline. Your conversation is confidential, but ifwe feel that you or someone else is at serious risk of harm, we may have to link in with other services. We'll let you know if that becomes necessary. -Do you need urgent support? Respond 1 for 'Yes' or 2 for 'No'
